title: Visions of the Veil
goal: Kaelen experiences a powerful, unsettling vision, revealing fragments of the antagonist's true nature or a looming catastrophe.

beats.summary: Kaelen retreats into deep meditation, seeking clarity and answers within the currents of ancient magic, pushing his mind to its limits.
He is overwhelmed by a chaotic, terrifying vision: swirling shadows, the screams of countless souls, and the looming, indistinct form of a malevolent entity.
The vision leaves him physically and spiritually shaken, but with a new, profound sense of urgency and a clearer understanding of the pervasive threat.
Kaelen shares fragmented, disturbing details with Lyra, who, though troubled, attempts to piece together the meaning from her own research into forbidden lore.
